mapper.insert: insert into service_order (id, order_number, create_time, personnel_id, package_id, address, finish_time, notes) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{personnelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{packageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update service_order set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, personnel_id = #{personnelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, order_number, create_time, personnel_id, package_id, address, finish_time, notes from service_order where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, order_number, create_time, personnel_id, package_id, address, finish_time, notes from service_order
